about_the_game:
Imagine inheriting a farm AND a shop.

What would you do with it? Yes, it's a mess. Yes, it needs work. But it's yours—and without a mortgage. In this economy?!

Restore Your Farm

Transform this abandoned land into the thriving farm it deserves to be.
Grow your own crops, take care of animals (coming soon), and upgrade your surroundings.

It'll take effort, but soon you'll be able to acquire new tools, improve your buildings, and customize the farm of your dreams.

Create Your Dream Store

Why sell your crops and produce to someone else when you can do it yourself?

Ever heard of a farmer's market? Well, this shop has the "farmer" part sorted.

Organize your shop, manage the goods on your shelves, and handle all the finances!

Don't forget to leave your customers satisfied - they can and they will write a review.

Hire Someone To Do The Job

Feeling lazy? We all have been here - just hire help.

Tending the shop and carrying heavy boxes can be tiring. It's only natural to want someone to do it for you.

Luckily, there are always people who like money and are willing to work for it.

Just don't forget to pay salaries.


Master the Art of Multitasking

Running a farm and a shop at the same time isn’t easy. But you’ve got this!

Balance your time between tending to crops, serving customers, and managing the chaos.

Will you focus on strict business? Go personal and sustainable? Maybe a bit of both? Only you can decide.

This game is in early access so some features may still be in development.

At the moment, the game is fully translated into English, with machine translations for other languages.

Here are some of the plans for the future:

  • Farm animals

  • Bees.

  • Greenhouse.

  • More customization.

  • Farm and storage expansions.

  • More diversity in produce and customers.

If you have ideas, or suggestions or want to offer help with translation in your language - feel free to contact us in Discord.

name: Farmer's Shop Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Create your own farm. Harvest crops, take care of animals, sell goods, set prices at your discretion, hire staff, expand, design, and build your dream farm.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese, Polish
